divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving back from my friends on 5th nov,when a bright orange light in the sky got my attention.At first it was just hovering there,then it moved silently towards me slightly to my left passed and went by before dissapearing into thin air.I had to pull over and exit my vehicle to get a look at this thing as i knew straight away it was different to anything i had ever seen before.I HAD ON ME A DIGITAL CAMERA ,BUT IN MY EXCITEMENT COULD NOT ACTIVATE THE VIDEO,INSTEAD I JUST TOOK ONE SINGLE PHOTO OF A MINUTE ORANGE DOT IN THE DISTANCE.Although its a bad photo you can clearly see how orange the object was.Im into the ufo scene and always looking,but also making sure there are no strobe lights are anything of that nature,making sure its not a plane or helicopter.But heres the deal.Gets home to tell my partner and she seen it also.The VERY next night ,the 6th it was back.My partner and my 5 year old daughter were watching it hovering over the town from our bedroom window.We all watched it for a couple of minutes,then i ran for my camera,but as soon as i got it ,my partner said it had just blinked out and dissapeared into thin air.Just now on the 8th,i was driving to the shops and there it is again.I pulled over and watched it hovering over the vacinity of bolton a town nearby to ours.It hovered for a couple of minutes,then sort of circled upwards,going round and round in very tight circles,before it sort of shrank in size and completely dissapeared.I came home checked the web to see if our local paper has been covering any sightings.When all i could find was a few storys of orange lights over lancashire england,i had to tell someone and here i am telling you.I am absolutly posotive that what i saw was no conventional craft,and as far as im concerned have elimanated such objects as chinese lanterns and fireworks etc.The way in wich this thing hovered then moved silently and quickly,then dissapearing into thin air,has astounded me.I have never reported anything in my life before ,but thought it was to good a sighting to dismiss without sharing it with someone such as you at mufon.
Summary: like a triangle shaped bright orange light
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
